name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Sleeps, mikeronomicon, SharkOfSomerton, atticusonline, Jeet, chatterjee, Afkpuz, littlefatdog)

name: rowboat
text: He had to give it back to Holden Caulfield.

name: heccibiggs
text: Literature chubby.

name: boredom_man
text: A comment left by boredom_man was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ted0phile, drago25, dullard, slysa, morbo)

name: charchar
text: I think your lamers have never been nerdy in the South.  Here's a commiseration chubby and a washcloth to wipe the spittle-spray off your face (Damn Baptists can get worse than sprinklers).

name: boredom_man
text: That sounds like a reasonable guess. It's not a comment I find particularly lame, but I've made some comments here that weren't lamed enough, I think, and I'm at peace with that. Also I intend to drink whiskey and beat my kid until I feel better.

name: saint
text: Healthy lifestyles are for people that watch Oprah and talk about their feelings.

name: farqussus
text: people WHO watch Oprah.

name: saint
text:
hey thanks.

helluva guy, that one.

name: sp1derbaby
text: Or Ignatius J. Reilly.

name: rowboat
text: Yeah, I'd say that T falls pretty much right between Caulfield and Reilly. Personality- and hat-wise.

name: shinkusan
text: Ahhhh, that kills me.

name: mystkmanat
text: A comment left by mystkmanat was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by patkun, Carlyle, TonyHighwind)

name: wjon
text:
Chubby because I wanted to chubby asherdan, but couldn't bring myself to do it. But you did, and admitted it, and took the lames like a manatee. I respect that.

I respect manatees that tell it like it is.

name: mystkmanat
text:
Little known fact: manatees are incapable of guile.

(PS- thanks)

name: deusoma
text: Living bean bag chairs with dopey, adorable faces and without the capacity to lie. No wonder I feel the instinctive urge to hug them.

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
Maybe this is why-

Quote:
Tomorrow's menu: Hog with Prawn.

name: asherdan
text: Chubbied for diving in the filth side of life...

name: carlyle
text: Because your a massive douche.

name: mystkmanat
text: Not pulling any punches there are you, carlyle?

name: carlyle
text:
Of course not. The man's got some good comments and he's got a lot of bad ones.


((also, just discovered the whole inbox mechanic so I can see all the comments that are replying to me is this basic knowledge to everyone else?))

name: mystkmanat
text:
So was it that the whole "Oh man, a good post by asherdan how crazy" thing is played out? I would have to agree. I guess that was sort of lame of me.

((Yes, I am pretty sure it is common knowledge.))

name: dallovich
text: What a bitchin hat!

name: theguitarhero
text: It's a good hat to have on.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: It is the hat of an honest man.

name: petitegitan
text: Ray clearly hates the sound of Teodor's banjo skillz.

name: saint
text:
Ray's lyrics in this and the last strip are the most metal things screamed ever...right after "Bein Fat Rocks!"

Retroactively applied joke. Next time, ti

name: direhaggis
text: It does not appear to be aaaiiiiight.

name: tombsgrave
text: Satan Banjo Ray is the greetest.  And I meant to misspell that.

name: i_love_kate
text: Now he must leave Earth for no raisin.

name: apricotta
text: Chubbied for both your Futurama avatar and a Futurama quote.

name: atticusonline
text: 3 chubbies for 3 futuramas!

name: apricotta
text: Oh my God I just changed my avatar I'm so sorry.

name: atticusonline
text: :-O How do you retract chubbies? You are dechubbied...unless you quote your favorite "Scruffy" moment.

name: apricotta
text:
Ahem...

*Bender fails to forever fix the Plasma Fusion Boiler*
*Plasma Fusion Boiler releases considerable amounts of steam*
Scruffy: Scruffy's gonna die the way he lived.

*bows*

name: atticusonline
text:
You have softened my heart.

"Name's Scruffy, I'm the janitor."

name: apricotta
text: "Then why aren't YOU fixing the boiler?"

name: atticusonline
text:
"I've never seen you before!"
"I've never seen YOU before neither!"

name: apricotta
text: I think we entered the Endless Futurama Quoting Frenzy loop.

name: atticusonline
text:
Fry: I'm Santa Claus!
Hermes: No, I'm Santa Claus!

Amy: We're also Santa Claus!

Dr. Zoidberg: And I'm his friend Jesus.

Mayor: None of you are Santa Claus! How dare you lie in front of Jesus!

name: apricotta
text:
Prof. Farnsworth: This is a chance for Fry to test out my experimental anti-pressure pill.
*shows the extremely huge pill*
Fry: I can't swallow that!
Prof. Farnsworth: Well then, good news! It's a suppository.

name: atticusonline
text: Goooooooooooooood timessssssss

name: apricotta
text:
They really were, weren't they?

Have you seen any of the Futurama movies? I have. Can't say I liked them. :/

name: atticusonline
text:
I saw the first one. It was ok, but I don't think they'll ever top what they had.

"Nice eyeball, eyeball."
"Nice ass, ass."

Good to see you back on the old strips, apricotta!

name: apricotta
text:
Fry: He stole my clover, he stole my name and he stole my life!
*punches the statue*
And now he broke my hand!
Bender: His legend lives on!

Oh, I'm always around. Good to know some people care!

name: tekende
text: God, get a room, you two.

name: apricotta
text: We're in a room!

name: atticusonline
text: "I hid it in a secret hiding place whose location I never told anyone, not even Scruffy!"

name: heccibiggs
text:
Well then lose some weight!


In terms of favourite Scruffy moment, I fully enjoy the bit in The Beast With A Billion Backs where Fry's going through his phonebook...

LEELA
SCRUFFY CELL
SCRUFFY HOME

name: i_love_kate
text: "Scruffy's wheeling in a large pill."

name: apricotta
text: "I've never seen him so down... or ever before."

name: scifigrl47
text: And this makes it the first page I've ever run out of chubbies on.  Chubb on, Scruffy-lovers.

name: soticoto
text: The opposite of what I was thinking.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: I guess she told you.

name: m1st3rbl4ck
text: Ring!

name: deancain29
text: RING RING!

name: soticoto
text: Ring ring ring ring, Bananaphone!

name: paco
text: Wow, hilarious!

name: luckyg
text: Alt text: Don't worry, he's not going to play him Hog and Prawn.

name: deancain29
text: RING

name: laudabilis
text: If you're a phone, and you say "ring!", you ought to say it in a very upbeat way.

name: jeet
text: Or else you might give some one the Depression.

name: teira
text: You ever think maybe this banjo was what caused Mr. Band?

name: heavymetaljesus
text: AIIIIIGHT?!

name: dougthehead
text: Ray's lyrics seem even funnier when coming out of an innocuous cell phone on the dresser.

name: mikemcg
text:
Hogs and prawns: not kosher.

AAIIIIIGHT!

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Sound like fixins for a mighty good gumbo though. We gon' put ever non-kosher thing in we can thank. Bugs an clams, oysters shit like dat.

name: jdhenry105
text: Ring!

name: hypoluxa
text: Some of the best lyrics ever written all up ins.

name: the_prophet
text: The hog shall lay with the prawn

name: ham_shoes
text:
It sounds like a Jethro Tull lyric.
whump

name: farqussus
text: 5 for the alt text

name: jesler729
text: I really enjoy the "whump" alot more than I should.

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Pat: Why do fat women always think they have a chance with me?

name: chachibenji
text: Being a Christian, this strip actually scares me quite a lot. :(

name: charchar
text: Don't fret, dude: Jesus could probably kick that cartoon cat's ass.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: dude, Jesus would only have to look at Ray and the floor would open and posit him into the 'neath.

name: alzuna
text:
Teodor answered his cellphone, with his mind .

Or there was a cut scene I missed....

name: heccibiggs
text: No, it's a walkie-talkie. No answering necessary.

name: tekende
text: Yes, which is why I imagine that the "Ring!" was not the phone, but Ray shouting "Ring!" into the phone.

name: howl
text: I count five alrights (and variations thereof) in this strip.

name: unsentletter
text:
THE HOG SHALL LAY WITH THE PRAWN!

I chortled so hard that my stomach gurgled. So awesome.

Don't fugue, Ray!

name: dj_douche
text: You peons are missing the point. I really really need to know why Ray keeps fuguing on the lyrics to his banjo-driven melodious songs, and why he is almost aping Nice Pete's bible slash fiction. Is it just because he is wasted?

name: atticusonline
text:
Calling us peons makes me want to give you a hug.

A sad hug.

a SOSAD hug.

Also I hate you.

name: dj_douche
text:
Hey, I hate people like me.

On another note I still haven't quite figured out what was going on in this story arc. It is most intriguing.

name: atticusonline
text:
The banjo is imbued with the soul of Satan. Ray is becoming possessed and is having fits.

This is causing Teodor some chagrin.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: all jarring.

name: redheron
text: whump

name: genequagmire
text: Death metal.

text: canuhbull corps, aaaiiiiight!
